extension.news:
1.0.0
Important note: if you are migrating from a version older than 1.x.x, ensure the URL of your preferred instance is not prefixed with "https://" (you may reset the add-on settings to default to use a valid initial value).
New features: * Provide an external API requiring only the instance and the id of the video * Guide the user when libtorrent cannot be imported
Improvements: * Speed up the listing of videos when searching or browsing (the resolution and the full URL are now defined only when the user plays a video)
